comments.body: Aether was never in minecraft. That was a myth and a mod for Minecraft Java. Mojang will add new dimensions after finishing the 3 they have now.
I wasn't a minecraft player then. What was the Aether like? It sounds cool!
It was rejected.
I would like them to be easier to find
Basalt deltas already are volcanic, so this would be too similar.
Also veins of crying obsidian. Instead of having to find broken portals. Also have a black sand option here.
would make it also easy to create a working skyblock map without downloading a mod or a custom map
Especially if the villager trades are now biome dependent this would be really important for Superflat Survival players.

i would love to see a superflat world with all overworld biomes, it would remove the struggle of getting different types of trees by wondering traders and add so much fun to playing a superflat world in survival! it can also help in the creation of new kind of farms, since normal worlds need terraforming or good seeds to try smth out. i really look forward to an addition like this, since the problem is only on single biome worlds.

something like ;minecraft:overworld would be nice in the superflat creation model to include all overworld biomes including cave ones.

I think the goal and intended plan for the end is to be somewhat barren and lifeless. If they add a new wood type for the End, it should be done in a way that doesn't make it feel too alive, much like the Chorus plants, which despite being plants feel alien-like enough to make it still feel lifeless.
I also made a suggestion about how there should be new wood in the end. I honestly think the end just needs something beside the elytra to go after and a new wood for builder is a nice idea. Upvote!

And when an undead mob ends up standing on it they‚Äôll take damage and die until they get off the placed salt. When it‚Äôs placed it pretty much looks like redstone but light grey/white instead.

I want them to add tonnes and tonnes of birds to all the biomes in the game. I'm talking at least 10 - 15 and preferably more. Just imagine the ambience it would add. They wouldn't even do anything besides making sounds and dropping feathers. For a Swedish forest, I think robins, woodpeckers, great grey owls, carrion crows, you know just birds that live up there. Idk why but european stuff seems almost more minecrafty in a way idk

Naciones Unidas bioma exclusivo para una version ya sea java o bedrock no solo podria ser ps4 para empezar, seria demasiado injusto y en todo caso de ser experimental podria dar muchos problemas de lag en consola y moviles. En todo caso si se a√±adiese un bioma de pruba seria en java la edicion exclusiva de pc donde un ordenador podria soportar esos errores como por ejemplo de rendimiento antes que un movil (tambien depende del ordenador y del movil) pero en general se suele dejar probar antes el nuevo contenido en pc hasta que sea seguro probarlo en otras versiones para dispositivos no tan potentes 

Text: ‚ÄúUnited Nations biome exclusive to a version either java or bedrock could not only be ps4 to begin with, it would be too unfair and in any case being experimental could give many lag problems on console and mobile. In any case if you added a test biome would be in java the exclusive edition of pc where a computer could withstand those errors such as performance before a mobile (it also depends on the computer and the mobile) but in general it is usually left to try the new content on pc before until it is safe to try it on other versions for not so powerful devices ‚Äù

- Translated by Admin
